responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "5C0EE6124B5401F2489E9F9A6AC08D5F", "That\'s the Old King\'s Road, gateway to Hammer Rest. Or it was. Now it\'s crawling with Clay Dwarves. They look like us, almost, but they\'re just... hollow shells filled with strange mechanisms and glowing runes we can\'t decipher. And whatever they are, they\'re getting smarter, more aggressive.")
name: ANV_FTUE_0007_Commander_GrettaIronhand_6_Response
